data.oai_dc:dc: this dataset was gathered as part of a Scottish Natural Heritage contract in 2013/14. It provides the results of invertebrate surveys designed to inform Site Condition Monitoring at Abernethy Forest SSSI. These surveys targeted the notified click beetle (Ampedus tristis), bug (Eremocoris fenestratus), narrow-headed ant (Formica exsecta), pine mason bee (Osmia uncinata), cousin German moth (Protolampra sobrina), northern damselfly (Coenagrion hastulatum) and spiders (Araneae) features, but other invertebrate taxa were also recorded.|554 occurrences
